link.title: Nacogdoches ISD Corona Virus Updates

p.span: 420 S. Shawnee, Nacogdoches, TX 75961

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: right; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: right; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
text-decoration: underline;

p.style: margin-left: 20px; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: right; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We will educate and inspire everyone to achieve

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: excellence.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Oswald; font-size: 38px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Texas schools now closed through May 1

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: text-align: center;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-II5mzb pSzOP-AhqUyc-II5mzb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

div.p: Texas schools will not reopen before the end of the 2019-2020 academic year because of ongoing restrictions related to the COVID-19 crisis, Gov. Greg Abbott announced today. The governor’s executive order means schools will wrap up the academic year through distance learning models already launched, including in Nacogdoches ISD.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

div.p: Abbott said Texas Education Agency would provide public school districts in the coming days further guidance on how to wrap up the academic year, including directions on holding graduation ceremonies for the Class of 2020.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

div.p: In the meantime, distance learning will continue for NISD’s Student Nutrition will continue providing meals for children. Distribution sites include: Brooks-Quinn-Jones Elementary, Fredonia Elementary, Mike Moses Middle School, McMichael Middle School and the NISD Central Kitchen located on Hughes Street. Meals will continue to be distributed on Mondays and Wednesdays.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

div.p: Continue to monitor NISD’s social media accounts [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @nacogdoches.isd] for further updates. NISD will also communicate with parents and staff through email updates, and the district will provide updates to Nacogdoches-area media.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Las escuelas de Texas no volverán a abrir por el resto del final del año académico 2019-2020 debido a las restricciones actuales relacionadas con la crisis COVID-19, esto anunció hoy el gobernador Greg Abbott. La orden ejecutiva del gobernador significa que las escuelas concluirán el año académico a través de modelos de aprendizaje a distancia ya creados, como los incluidos en Nacogdoches ISD.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: El gobernador Abbott dijo que la Agencia de Educación de Texas proporcionará a los distritos de las escuelas públicas en los próximos días más orientación sobre cómo concluir el año académico, esto incluirá las instrucciones para celebrar ceremonias de graduación para la Clase del 2020.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Mientras tanto, la Nutrición Estudiantil de NISD continuará brindando comidas a los niños. Los sitios de distribución incluyen: Brooks-Quinn-Jones Elementary, Fredonia Elementary, Mike Moses Middle School, McMichael Middle School y NISD Central Kitchen ubicada en Hughes Street. Las comidas continuarán siendo distribuidas los lunes y miércoles.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.p: Por favor continúe monitoreando las cuentas de redes sociales de NISD [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @ nacogdoches.isd] para más información. NISD también se comunicará con los padres y el personal a través de actualizaciones por correo electrónico, y el distrito proporcionará actualizaciones a los medios del área de Nacogdoches.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Texas schools now closed through May 1

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Gov. Greg Abbott today amended his earlier declaration and has now extended the closure of schools in Texas through Friday, May 1. The earliest classes in Texas could resume is now Monday, May 4, unless the closure is otherwise extended.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Continue to monitor NISD’s social media accounts [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @nacogdoches.isd] for further updates. NISD will also communicate with parents and staff through email updates, and the district will provide updates to Nacogdoches-area media.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: El Gobernador Greg Abbott modificó hoy su declaración anterior y ahora ha extendido el cierre de escuelas en Texas hasta el viernes 1 de mayo. Las primeras clases en Texas podrían reanudarse ahora el lunes 4 de mayo, a menos que el cierre se extienda de otra manera, según el Gobernador .

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Por favor continúe monitoreando las cuentas de redes sociales de NISD [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @ nacogdoches.isd] para más actualizaciones. NISD también se comunicará con los padres y el personal a través de actualizaciones por correo electrónico, y el distrito proporcionará actualizaciones a los medios del área de Nacogdoches.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Today, Texas Governor Greg Abbott declared a public health disaster for the state. In this declaration all schools were ordered closed through April 3, 2020, because of the ongoing threat from COVID-19 (coronavirus). Nacogdoches ISD has now closed its schools to in-person classes indefinitely, pending action from the governor to lift or extend the existing closure. It is possible that conditions in Nacogdoches County could require NISD to extend the closure beyond the time the governor decides school can reopen statewide.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Continue to monitor NISD’s social media accounts [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @nacogdoches.isd] for further updates. NISD will also communicate with parents and staff through email updates, and the district will provide updates to Nacogdoches-area media.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: NISD Student Nutrition will continue to provide meals for students age 18 and younger. Also, online learning resources are available by going to www.nacisd.org. Beginning next week, paper learning resources for students lacking Internet connection at home will be available for parents to pick up. Information on pick-up times and sites will be released beforehand on the district’s Facebook and Twitter accounts and through email notification.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Alton Frailey

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Interim Superintendent of Schools

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Hoy, el Gobernador de Texas Greg Abbott declaró un desastre de salud pública para el estado. En esta declaración, se ordenó el cierre de todas las escuelas hasta el 3 de abril de 2020, debido a la continua amenaza de COVID-19 (coronavirus). El Distrito Escolar Independiente de Nacogdoches ahora ha cerrado sus escuelas y las clases en persona indefinidamente, con la espera de que el gobernador tome medidas para levantar o extender el cierre existente. Es posible que las condiciones en el condado de Nacogdoches requieran que NISD extienda el cierre más allá del tiempo que el gobernador decida que la escuela pueda reabrir en todo el estado.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Por favor continúe monitoreando las cuentas de redes sociales de NISD [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @ nacogdoches.isd] para más actualizaciones. NISD también se comunicará con los padres y el personal a través de actualizaciones por correo electrónico, y el distrito proporcionará actualizaciones a los medios del área de Nacogdoches.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: El departamento de nutrición de NISD continuará proporcionando comidas para estudiantes de 18 años o menos. Además, los recursos de aprendizaje en línea están disponibles en www.nacisd.org. A partir de la próxima semana, los recursos de aprendizaje en copias de papel estarán disponibles para que los padres los recojan, para los estudiantes que carecen de conexión a Internet en el hogar. La información sobre los horarios y sitios de recogida se divulgará en las cuentas de Facebook y Twitter del distrito y mediante notificación por correo electrónico.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sinceramente,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Alton Frailey

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Superintendente Interino de Escuelas

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: While we continue to evaluate the rapidly developing situation regarding COVID-19 (new coronavirus), out of an abundance of caution, Nacogdoches ISD will remain closed through Friday, March 27.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Our initial determination, as it was with most school districts, announcing an initial closure was made to give as much advance notice as we felt safe in providing. At the time of our decision neither Texas nor federal officials had issued formal declarations of emergency.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As families return from travel and testing is made more readily available, there is an increased risk of reports of exposure and/or confirmations of positive coronavirus cases.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: A decision of confirmation of the reopening or extension of closure of the school district will be made and communicated by 5 p.m. Thursday, March 26. Before settling on a decision, we will work with local health officials and follow guidance from Texas Education Agency and the Centers for Disease Control to assess our current exposure and potential for exposure.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Parents with concerns about exposure can contact NISD’s Director of Nurses Mary Whitten at mwhitten@nacisd.org or the Texas Department of State Health Services Region 04/05N Health Offices, which oversees Nacogdoches County, at 866-310-9698.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: During the closure, the NISD Student Nutrition Department will continue providing free lunches for students age 18 and younger.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: For

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: more information, go to this link:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The extended time off raises questions about lost instruction time. We are working on provisions for a continuation of learning for our students, and you will hear more in the coming days from your child’s school. As we move farther into this, it is likely adjustments will be made to the 2019-2020 academic calendar.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: It’s safe to say, as a nation, we’re in uncharted waters. While this is not solely a Nacogdoches problem, or an even a Texas problem, how we move forward from here requires a communal effort. I know this continues to be a challenge for many families; we don’t make these decisions lightly. Please be sure that every decision made by NISD is guided by an overriding concern for the safety of students, staff and extended district family.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 12px; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: In the meantime, continue to monitor NISD’s social media accounts [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @nacogdoches.isd] for further updates. NISD will also communicate with parents and staff through email updates, and the district will provide updates to Nacogdoches-area media.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Alton Frailey

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Interim Superintendent of Schools

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Mientras continuamos evaluando la situación de rápido desarrollo con respecto al COVID-19 (nuevo coronavirus), por precaución, el Distrito Escolar Independiente de Nacogdoches permanecerá cerrado hasta el viernes 27 de marzo. Nuestra determinación inicial, como sucedió con la mayoría de los distritos escolares, al anunciar una extensión de las vacaciones de primavera se hizo para dar la mayor anticipación posible en cuanto era seguro proveerla. En el momento de nuestra decisión, ni el Estado de Texas ni las autoridades federales habían emitido declaraciones formales de emergencia.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: A medida que las familias regresan del viaje y las pruebas del virus se hacen más fácilmente disponibles, ha habido un incremento de casos de exposición y / o confirmaciones de casos positivos del coronavirus. La decisión de confirmación de la reapertura, extensión, o del cierre del distrito escolar se tomará y se comunicará antes de las 5 p.m. Jueves, 26 de marzo. Antes de tomar una decisión, trabajaremos con los funcionarios locales de salud y seguiremos las instrucciones de la Agencia de Educación de Texas y los Centros para el Control de Enfermedades para evaluar nuestra exposición actual y potencial de exposición.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Los padres con que tengan inquietudes sobre la exposición del virus pueden comunicarse con la Directora de Enfermeras de NISD, Mary Whitten, con su correo electrónico a mwhitten@nacisd.org o con la Región 04 / 05N del Departamento de Servicios de Salud del Estado de Texas, quien supervisa el Condado de Nacogdoches, al 866-310-9698.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Durante el cierre, el Departamento de Nutrición Estudiantil del NISD continuará brindando almuerzos gratis para estudiantes de 18 años o menos. Para más información, vaya a este enlace:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: El tiempo libre prolongado ha creado preguntas sobre el tiempo perdido de instrucción. Estamos trabajando en disposiciones para una continuación del aprendizaje de nuestros estudiantes, y en los próximos días escuchará más información de parte de la escuela de su hijo/a. A medida que avanzamos en esto, es probable que se realicen ajustes en el calendario académico 2019-2020.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Es seguro decir que, como nación, estamos en aguas desconocidas. Si bien esto no es solo un problema de Nacogdoches, o incluso un problema de Texas, la forma en que avanzamos desde aquí requiere un esfuerzo comunitario. Sé que esto sigue siendo un desafío para muchas familias; no tomamos estas decisiones a la ligera. Tomen por seguro de que cada decisión tomada por NISD ha sido guiada por una preocupación primordial en mantener la seguridad de los estudiantes, el personal y la familia extendida del distrito.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Mientras tanto, continúe monitoreando las cuentas de redes sociales de NISD [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @ nacogdoches.isd] para más actualizaciones. NISD también se comunicará con los padres y el personal a través de actualizaciones por correo electrónico, y el distrito proporcionará actualizaciones a los medios del área de Nacogdoches.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sinceramente,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Alton Frailey

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Superintendente Interino de las Escuelas

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Nacogdoches ISD will extend its spring break by two days for staff and three days for students. For now, NISD teachers and staff should plan on returning to work on Wednesday, March 18, and students would be back at school on Thursday, March 19.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: I don’t make this decision without an understanding of the problems it will create for parents. But the health and safety of students and staff are paramount, and because of that, I have decided to delay the restart of classes.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: During this delay, the district will have time to plan for what comes next as Texas and national officials react to the spread of COVID-19. District custodians will continue to ensure rooms and commons areas are thoroughly cleaned, and we are also taking additional cleaning precautions on our buses.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: For staff and parents, here is a link to the Centers for Disease Control website and more information about COVID-19: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/index.html.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Additionally, beginning Friday, all extra-curricular activities – athletic, academic and fine arts – for NISD will be canceled or postponed. Students already qualifying for state level competition will be able to participate, if the events take place. Here’s a link to a page with a list of cancelations:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As the situation continues to evolve, there is the very real possibility that classes may be postponed beyond March 19. Monitor NISD’s social media accounts [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @nacogdoches.isd] for further updates. NISD will also communicate with parents and staff through email updates, and the district will provide updates to Nacogdoches-area media.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: While we do not want to overly react, I hope you understand that the many unknowns warrant extra considerations at this time.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Alton Frailey

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Interim Superintendent of School

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Nacogdoches ISD extenderá sus vacaciones de primavera por dos días más para el personal y tres días más para los estudiantes. Por ahora, los maestros y el personal de NISD deberían planear regresar al trabajo el miércoles 18 de marzo, y los estudiantes regresarían a la escuela el jueves 19 de marzo.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: No tome esta decisión sin comprender los problemas que creará para los padres. Pero la salud y la seguridad de los estudiantes y el personal son primordiales, y por eso, he decidido retrasar el reinicio de las clases.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Durante este retraso, el distrito tendrá tiempo para planificar de acuerdo a las reacciones y medidas tomadas por los funcionarios nacionales y de Texas en lo que respecta a la propagación de COVID-19. Los conserjes del distrito continuarán garantizando que las instalaciones y las áreas comunes se limpien a fondo, y también estamos tomando precauciones de limpieza adicionales en nuestros autobuses.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Para el personal y los padres, aquí hay un enlace al sitio web de los Centros para el Control de Enfermedades y más información sobre COVID-19: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-nCoV/index.html.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Además, a partir del viernes, todas las actividades extracurriculares (atléticas, académicas y de bellas artes) para NISD serán canceladas o pospuestas. Los estudiantes que ya califican para la competencia a nivel estatal podrán participar, si los eventos aun continúan. Aquí hay un enlace a una página con una lista de cancelaciones:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: A medida que la situación continúa evolucionando, existe la posibilidad muy real de que las clases se pospongan más allá del 19 de marzo. Por favor monitoree las cuentas de redes sociales de NISD [Twitter: @NacISD; Facebook: @ nacogdoches.isd] para más actualizaciones. NISD también se comunicará con los padres y el personal a través de actualizaciones por correo electrónico, y el distrito proporcionará actualizaciones a los medios del área de Nacogdoches. Si bien no queremos reaccionar demasiado, espero que entiendan que las muchas incógnitas justifican las consideraciones adicionales tomadas en este momento.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sinceramente,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Alton Frailey

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Superintendente Interino de Escuela

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: An outbreak of respiratory illness caused by a new coronavirus first identified in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China, has caused an outbreak of respiratory illness in other parts of the world. The United States has confirmed a handful of novel coronavirus cases, mostly related to travel. I want to assure you that our school district is keeping track of this situation through proven and trustworthy sources: our local health department, the Texas Department of State Health Services (DSHS), and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: These health officials believe the risk to our school community is low at this time.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Updated information from the CDC on coronavirus in the United States can be found at: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html. The most recent information about coronavirus in Texas may be found at: https://dshs.texas.gov/coronavirus/.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Much is being learned about this newly emerged virus. Based on the current information, health officials are recommending local communities and schools should take similar steps to protect against coronavirus as we take to prevent the spread of everyday illnesses like the common cold or the flu:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. If soap and water are not available, use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Avoid close contact with people who are sick.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Stay home when you are sick.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Cover your mouth and nose with the inside of your elbow when you cough or sneeze.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The 2019 coronavirus is believed to be spread through the air when an infected person coughs or sneezes, much in the way the flu and other respiratory viruses spread. Symptoms can be fever, cough, or difficulty breathing. At this time, persons considered at risk are those with travel to China, or those in close contact with persons infected with coronavirus.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: NISD Plant Services custodians properly clean and sanitize classrooms, restrooms and cafeterias on a daily basis, concentrating on contact points such as counters, desktops and door knobs, to minimize the spread of disease. Additionally, NISD school nurses notify Plant Services in the event of elevated absenteeism at a particular campus or classroom. Upon receiving that information, NISD custodians perform a deep clean, which includes use of a fogger to disperse disinfectant onto every surface possible.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: While a new type of illness can be scary, we can protect our students, teachers, and the broader community by using simple everyday actions that protect people from other types of respiratory viruses. Our teachers, school nurses, and staff are working carefully to encourage these simple and effective habits of frequent handwashing, covering every cough or sneeze, and cleaning classroom tables/surfaces frequently, along with the involvement of custodians from the district’s Plant Services department.

p.span: Thank you for your support of our district, our schools, our students and our teachers and staff.

p.span: Throughout the Nacogdoches ISD district and campus websites, there are external links to other educational and informative websites that do not reside on the Nacogdoches ISD web servers and are not monitored or maintained by Nacogdoches ISD.
